title: ISic000932. I.Sicily inscription 000932
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]+++[---]
Εὐτύχιος
ἐτελεύτη-
σε τῇ πρὸ ιγ´
5[Ὀ]κτωβρί[ων]

Apparatus criticus

Text based upon Orsi and Ferrua; Δ(αιμοσιν) Θ(εοῖς) Χ(θονίοις)Ferrua; [Ἐνθά]δε κ[ῖτε]KaibelOrsi and Crispi report three characters, seemingly a lambda, Roman D or a theta, and a chi, at the centre of the line.
4: ICCrispiKaibel proposes reading IE after Crispi
5: Earlier editors propose reading ΚΑΛ before the month name, but Ferrua is correct in suggesting there is no space and it was probably omitted.

translation

commentary

bibliography

  • Crispi 1823 263 no.1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002230
  • 14.0115 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072
  • 4.9465 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Orsi 2018 Tacc. 1, p.136 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002617
  • Ferrua 1989 no.476 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
